QuestData.Title: The Conveniences of Home
QuestData.Description: This chest could prove very useful to our efforts. Take the chest back to Shal'aran.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Traveler's Banking Chest to Shal'aran.
QuestData.RewardText: The heavy chest offers plenty of room to carry all of your belongings.

Objectives.Objective: Place the Banking Chest in Shal'aran
